Retrieve icite data including Relative Citation Ratio (RCR) for PubMed IDs.

icite.Rd

Retrieve icite data including Relative Citation Ratio (RCR) for PubMed IDs.

Usage

icite(pmids)

Arguments

pmids

vector of PubMed IDs to retrieve (max of 1000 at a time)

Value

a tibble including the following variables:

pmid

PubMed ID

authors

publication authors

citation_count

total citations

citations_per_year

mean citations per year

expected_citations_per_year

estimated

field_citation_rate

rate relative to field

is_research_article

boolean

journal

journal name abbr.

nih_percentile

percentile

relative_citation_ratio

RCR

title

article title

year

publication year

See URL for full details.

See also

https://icite.od.nih.gov/api

Author

Sean Davis seandavi@gmail.com

Examples

pmids <- c(26001965, 25015380)
icite_records <- icite(pmids)
dplyr::glimpse(icite_records)
#> Rows: 2
#> Columns: 25
#> $ pmid                        <int> 25015380, 26001965
#> $ year                        <int> 2014, 2015
#> $ title                       <chr> "High resolution mapping of modified DNA n…
#> $ authors                     <chr> "D Suzi Bryan, Monica Ransom, Biniam Adane…
#> $ journal                     <chr> "Genome Res", "Nucleic Acids Res"
#> $ is_research_article         <chr> "Yes", "Yes"
#> $ relative_citation_ratio     <dbl> 2.08, 0.95
#> $ nih_percentile              <dbl> 75.7, 48.2
#> $ human                       <dbl> 0, 0
#> $ animal                      <dbl> 0.25, 0.25
#> $ molecular_cellular          <dbl> 0.75, 0.75
#> $ apt                         <dbl> 0.25, 0.05
#> $ is_clinical                 <chr> "No", "No"
#> $ citation_count              <int> 75, 37
#> $ citations_per_year          <dbl> 6.818182, 3.700000
#> $ expected_citations_per_year <dbl> 3.282770, 3.901776
#> $ field_citation_rate         <dbl> 8.358358, 9.961819
#> $ provisional                 <chr> "No", "No"
#> $ x_coord                     <dbl> -0.4330127, -0.4330127
#> $ y_coord                     <dbl> -0.5, -0.5
#> $ cited_by_clin               <lgl> NA, NA
#> $ cited_by                    <list> <29785056, 26519467, 30919497, 26411877, 3…
#> $ references                  <list> <8223452, 19448611, 21062813, 8092694, 115…
#> $ doi                         <chr> "10.1101/gr.174052.114", "10.1093/nar/gkv5…
#> $ last_modified               <chr> "04/27/2025, 05:17:58", "04/27/2025, 04:38…
